# 借助开源项目，学习软件开发

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa
jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa
jiezhu-kaiyuan-xiangmu-xuexi-ruanjiankaifa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
